# zitadel_action_execution_function (Resource)

Resource representing an action execution triggered by a function.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the function. Valid values: `preuserinfo`, `preaccesstoken`, `presamlresponse`

### Optional

- `target_ids` (List of String) The list of target IDs to call.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
